page.title: 08Christmas Day, 1984
page.content: On the 25th December it was{Christmas} Day. I got up at 2.30 in the morning because my brother woke me up because he was excited. We both went into my mum's room and my mum said, "It's only 2:30 in the morning!" Anyway we all got up and opened them.I got the most of course, I always do. We got a computer and a TV and more. All day we played with the computer and ate all of our sweets and Turkey etc. After dinner we all had a game of Downfall and mum had a go on the computer and didn't do very well at all. Then we all had a rest and watched TV. There were some good programmes on and some not so good. Then we went to bed.
